exceptions.tactic: assert (Rbar_le l x) as Hlx by (apply Hlb; assumption).
exceptions.exn: The reference x was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: assert (Rbar_le x l) as Hxl by (apply Hub; assumption).
exceptions.exn: The reference l was not found in the current environment.
The reference l was not found in the current environment.
The reference x was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: apply Rbar_le_not_infty with (1 := Hub x); auto.
exceptions.exn: The reference Hub was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: apply Rbar_le_not_infty with x E; auto.
exceptions.exn: The reference x was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: apply Rbar_ub_m_infty with (E := E) in Hub.

exceptions.exn: Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

exceptions.tactic: apply Rbar_lb_p_infty with (E := E) in Hlb.

exceptions.exn: Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

original: intros Hlb Hub x Ex. assert (Rbar_le l x) as Hlx by (apply Hlb; assumption). assert (Rbar_le x l) as Hxl by (apply Hub; assumption). destruct l. - destruct x. + apply Rbar_le_antisym; auto. + exfalso. apply Rbar_le_not_infty with (1 := Hub x); auto. + exfalso. apply Rbar_le_not_infty with x E; auto. - apply Rbar_ub_m_infty with (E := E) in Hub. subst. reflexivity. - apply Rbar_lb_p_infty with (E := E) in Hlb. subst. reflexivity.
